dialog.title: about us
dialog.intro: We are open source community existing to promote science and research. We believe that everyone should have right to build highly accurate predictive models even if they would not usually have necessary skills.

citation.author: Albert Einstein
citation.text: We can not solve our problems with the same level of thinking that created them

dialog.ending: To work towards a better future, we all need to understand how and why complex mechanisms are changing and whats impacting that change
dialog.footer: PANDORA is made and maintained by @genular, a community working together to keep science a public good accessible to everyone. We are welcoming participation from organizations and individuals committed to advancing open tools for science. Visit our website for instructions on how you and/or your project/organization can join us.

tooltip.forums: Discuss with our community possible bugs & feature requests, or just write a usage tutorial
tooltip.github: Take part in development progress or report bugs you discovered
tooltip.translation: Join our Translation Community, add new or correct existing translations
